  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()

    • testSetTitleIncrementsSectionAndStoresTitle

      @Test public void testSetTitleIncrementsSectionAndStoresTitle()
      Tests the setTitle method of the data object to ensure it:
      • Correctly increments the section count.
      • Stores the formatted title in the titles map.
      • Sets the isNewSection flag to true.

      Initial state is verified to have no titles. After calling setTitle("# Introduction"), the method checks that the title map contains one entry with the expected formatted title and that the section flag is updated appropriately.

    • testSetTitleMultipleCalls

      @Test public void testSetTitleMultipleCalls()
      Verifies that multiple calls to setTitle() correctly increment the section counter and store each title with the appropriate numbering.

      This test ensures:

      • Each call to setTitle() adds a new entry to the titles map.
      • Titles are formatted with incremented section numbers (e.g., "# 1. Overview", "# 2. Details").
      • The final size of the titles map reflects the number of calls made.

      Console output is included for manual inspection of map size and title formatting.
